seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.pageSize

target.mrk: derby.storage.pageSize

seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.pageSize

target.mrk: derby.storage.pageSize

seg-source.mrk: Page size

target.mrk: Page size

seg-source.mrk: configuring

target.mrk: configuring

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Defines the page size, in bytes, for on-disk database pages for tables or indexes used during table or index creation. Set this property prior to issuing the CREATE TABLE or CREATE INDEX statement. This value will be used for the lifetime of the newly created conglomerates.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the page size, in bytes, for on-disk database pages for tables or indexes used during table or index creation.
Set this property prior to issuing the CREATE TABLE or CREATE INDEX statement.
This value will be used for the lifetime of the newly created conglomerates.

target.mrk: Defines the page size, in bytes, for on-disk database pages for tables or indexes used during table or index creation.
Set this property prior to issuing the CREATE TABLE or CREATE INDEX statement.
This value will be used for the lifetime of the newly created conglomerates.

seg-source.mrk: Valid conglomerates

target.mrk: Valid conglomerates

trans-unit.source: Tables and indexes, including the indexes created to enforce constraints.

seg-source.mrk: Tables and indexes, including the indexes created to enforce constraints.

target.mrk: Tables and indexes, including the indexes created to enforce constraints.

seg-source.mrk: Default

target.mrk: Default

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> automatically tunes for the database page size. If you have any LONG VARCHAR, LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA, BLOB, or CLOB columns, or if <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> estimates that the total length of the columns declared at create time is greater than 4096 bytes, the default page size for the table is set to 32768 bytes. Otherwise, the default is 4096 bytes.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> automatically tunes for the database page size.

If you have any LONG VARCHAR, LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA, BLOB, or CLOB columns, or if <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> estimates that the total length of the columns declared at create time is greater than 4096 bytes, the default page size for the table is set to 32768 bytes.
Otherwise, the default is 4096 bytes.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> automatically tunes for the database page size.

If you have any LONG VARCHAR, LONG VARCHAR FOR BIT DATA, BLOB, or CLOB columns, or if <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> estimates that the total length of the columns declared at create time is greater than 4096 bytes, the default page size for the table is set to 32768 bytes.
Otherwise, the default is 4096 bytes.

seg-source.mrk: Valid values

target.mrk: Valid values

trans-unit.source: Page size can only be one of the following values: 4096, 8192, 16384, or 32768 bytes. If you specify an invalid value, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value.

seg-source.mrk: Page size can only be one of the following values: 4096, 8192, 16384, or 32768 bytes.
If you specify an invalid value, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value.

target.mrk: Page size can only be one of the following values: 4096, 8192, 16384, or 32768 bytes.
If you specify an invalid value, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value.

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: -- changing the default for the system derby.storage.pageSize=8192 -- changing the default for the database CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.pageSize', '8192')

seg-source.mrk: -- changing the default for the system derby.storage.pageSize=8192 -- changing the default for the database CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.pageSize', '8192')

target.mrk: -- changing the default for the system derby.storage.pageSize=8192 -- changing the default for the database CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.pageSize', '8192')

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: This property is dynamic; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately. For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

seg-source.mrk: This property is dynamic; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

target.mrk: This property is dynamic; if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.
